table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

tr.td:
This work has been released into the public domain by its author, Orange Tuesday at English Wikipedia. This applies worldwide.
In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
Orange Tuesday grants anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse

div.p: Transferred from en.wikipedia to Commons by Shizhao using CommonsHelper.
div.div: The original description page was here. All following user names refer to en.wikipedia.

ul.li: 2008-07-18 19:16 Orange Tuesday 1050×600× (128599 bytes) {{Information |Description:New Version of [[:Image:Lionflag.svg]] with a cleaner emblem and the correct ratio. |Source=self-made, including [[:Image:Shir & Khorshid1.svg]] from commons. |Date= |Author=~~~ |other_versions= }}
